content: the trani court has made a final ruling on a case involving the dissolution of a community inheritance between two parties the court has approved a divisional project for the compensation of real estate as determined by an expert witness the court has also assigned shares to each party through a drawing of lots which will take place in the future the expenses related to the expert witness will be shared equally between the parties the court has dismissed any additional claims and the costs of the litigation will be offset the ruling was filed in the clerks office on july 14 2021
